pages.text: $(li)Minecart with TNT are a variant of the common $(l:patchouli:redstone/vanilla/minecart)Minecart$(/l).$(br)$(li)As the $(l:patchouli:redstone/vanilla/tnt)TNT$(/l), if explodes it will break near blocks and inflicts explosion damage to near creatures.

pages.title: Ways to explode TNT
pages.text: $(li)If it moves over a $(l:patchouli:redstone/vanilla/activator_rail)Activator Rail$(/l).$(br)$(li)If it is destroyed while in motion.$(br)$(li)If it is hitted by fire, lava, or an explosion.$(br)$(li)If it is hit by a $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/fire_charge)Fire Charge$(/l).
